job_description:
Sr. Business Development Consultant

New York City - 100K+ Earnings Year 1- March 2024 Start Date

Job Description:

We are seeking a motivated and results-driven Sr. Business Development Consultant to join our New York team, focusing on the Technology and Life Sciences sectors. As an BDR at GQR, you will play a crucial role in generating new business opportunities and contributing to our company’s rapid growth. This position is ideal for individuals passionate about technology, life sciences, and sales, aiming to develop their career in a fast-paced and innovative environment.

What We Offer:
• Competitive salary dependent on experience + bonus structure
• Attractive benefits package (health, vision, dental, 401K)
• Generous Flex PTO policy, 7 sick days & 5 Paid Volunteer Days (PVTO)
• Technology stipend & annual Wellness credit
• Comprehensive training from our dedicated, award-winning Learning & Development team
• Meritocratic career progression and leadership opportunities
• Direct reporting to industry experts & leadership, with global collaboration opportunities
• External learning cost-share reimbursements to further educate and develop in a field of your choice(available for VP+ employees)
• Company incentive trips based off individual performance or contribution
• Internal and external company events hosted on-site

If you would like to confidentially learn more about this opportunity, feel free to reach out to siobhan.osullivan@gqrgm.com for more information.

Benefits: Competitive salary dependent on experience + bonus structure
Generous Flex PTO policy, 7 sick days & 5 Paid Volunteer Days (PVTO)
Comprehensive training from our dedicated, award-winning Learning & Development team
Meritocratic career progression and leadership opportunities
Direct reporting to industry experts & leadership, with global collaboration opportunities
External learning cost-share reimbursements to further educate and develop in a field of your choice(available for VP+ employees)
Company incentive trips based off individual performance or contribution
Internal and external company events hosted on-site
